A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very sad to see the decline of the Star Wars Saga. Disney has really screwed the pooch. This movie won't be a let down for the masses and is still worth watching\, however\, for a fan from the beginning you will be sadly disappointed with the route Disney choose to take. \n\nHopefully\, Disney can find a way to salvage the series and turn it around in the next one....maybe. No lightsaber battle with Kylo and Luke? Seriously...
